job description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Kforce has a client that is looking for Business Data Analysts in Tampa, Florida (FL).

Duties Include:
  • Qualified candidates will analyze inventory transaction in SAP
  • Conduct weekly and month-end data reconciliation
  • Constructing weekly on-hand and in-transit inventory for SAP IBP baseline data
  • Participate in EDI mapping processes and responsible of maintaining IDOCs
  • Establish power query and Macro in Excel 2016 to streamline repetitive data conversion processes
  • Reengineer Reverse Logistic Process (RMA Process)
  • Cooperate with IT department and multiple Business Owners to create SAP training program in the effort of improving Daily Data System Support
REQUIREMENTS:

Requirements: Bachelor's degree or foreign degree equivalent in Business, Economics, Math, Statistics or Data Analytics and three months of experience in position.

Special requirements: Experience with constructing SAP data and EDI mapping processes. Travel to various unanticipated client sites required. May reside anywhere in the United States.

Qualified candidates should 'Post Mail' their resumes to:

  • Tampa, FL 33605
